de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.im.evaluate

Interface ImEvaluationComponent<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - a type, related to a component message, which is evaluated or returned by the specific derived class
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ImcEvaluationUnit, ImcEvaluator, ImcEvaluatorManager, ImEvaluationUnit, ImEvaluator, ImEvaluatorManager, ImvEvaluationUnit, ImvEvaluator, ImvEvaluatorManager
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractImcEvaluationUnitIetf, AbstractImEvaluationUnitIetf, AbstractImEvaluatorIetf, DefaultImcEvaluationUnit, DefaultImcEvaluator, DefaultImcEvaluatorManager, DefaultImvEvaluationUnit, DefaultImvEvaluator, DefaultImvEvaluatorManager

    public interface ImEvaluationComponent<T>
    Generic base for the composition of integrity measurement components.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<T> evaluate(ImSessionContext context)
      Conducts the integrity evaluation for its component type.
      List<T> handle(List<? extends T> components, ImSessionContext context)
      Evaluates a list of types, related to a component message.
      List<T> lastCall(ImSessionContext context)
      Asks for more results, before all messages will be send to the lower layers.
      void terminate()
      Terminates this integrity measurement component part.

    • Method Detail

      • evaluate

        List<T> evaluate(ImSessionContext context)
        Conducts the integrity evaluation for its component type. For the evaluation, it can take connection specific values from the context in to account.
        Parameters:
        context - the context, which holds connection specific values
        Returns:
        a list of results of the specific type

      • handle

        List<T> handle(List<? extends T> components,
             ImSessionContext context)
        Evaluates a list of types, related to a component message. For the evaluation, it can take connection specific values from the context in to account.
        Parameters:
        components - a list of types, related to a component message
        context - the context, which holds connection specific values
        Returns:
        a list of results of the specific type

      • lastCall

        List<T> lastCall(ImSessionContext context)
        Asks for more results, before all messages will be send to the lower layers. For this, it can take connection specific values from the context in to account.
        Parameters:
        context - the context, which holds connection specific values
        Returns:
        a list of results of the specific type

      • terminate

        void terminate()
        Terminates this integrity measurement component part.
